resources.string: We read the fine print\nso that you don\'t have to!
Privacy Monitor by Osano is a free, open source, privacy rating app that lets you quickly understand which sites ands apps should be trusted with your private data.
Access the privacy ratings in the app\nusing our private web browser.
Or quickly access ratings from the\nshare sheet of your favorite apps!

If you don't see the share sheet
when you click the share button from
your favorite apps, look for the
"more" button to open the
Activities options screen.
Next, make sure that Privacy Monitor is enabled, and drag \"Privacy Monitor\" to the top of the list.\n\nNow you\'re ready to take charge of your own privacy online!
No score found for this site.
Your request has been received and will be handled in the order received.
